text: Arasesata yetiya amara adesa ahila arau caukato uthali uthila, ami ka’lo, ‘pratyeka jatarae ejora ejorakai na'omta tuli loraa. Yisakalara biraud'dhe purba-sid'dhanta haiche sihamtara bahirae tomara paraiyalara arau yisakale imana aniche te'omlokako tuli loraa; arau te'omra lagata imana anichila kerala kichusankhyaka loke’
